special.name: Starter Cookie
special.desc: A plain cookie, but it's special because its your first. What a fine way to start a cookie adventure!

special.name: Opie's Magic Cookie
special.desc: A magical non-sexualized cookie baked by Opie

special.name: Bacon Cookie
special.desc: A normal choclate chip cookie that smells faintly of *ham*...

special.name: Slimy Cookie
special.desc: A well-dressed cookie covered in green slime.

special.name: Mountain Cookie
special.desc: A well-*test*ed staple in the diet of the hill people

special.name: Guardian Cookie
special.desc: A blue green cookie that's wet. Smells of salt and hardwork. Tastes like fish

special.name: Anime Cookie
special.desc: Nyaaa~ this cookie is decorated with a penguin and a neko (TN: neko means cat)

special.name: Fallen Cookie
special.desc: This once proud cookie has fallen. Maybe someday it'll return to glory...

special.name: Black and White Cookie
special.desc: Covered in black and white frosting. Kinda looks like a *panda*
